ygData.subject: Tinkering Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: I am planning a revolt of sorts on The Innoruuk server after the patch on Dec 1st if they do not remove the tinkering cap.  I have gotten about 6 guilds so far
ygData.messageBody:
I am planning a revolt of sorts on The Innoruuk server after the patch on Dec 1st if they do not remove the tinkering cap. I have gotten about 6 guilds so far to help me with this, we are all going to petition that the cap should be removed at the same time with anyone who doesn't have a clue having the Guide/Gm refer to me. If anyone else wanted to join in on the fun please do I will have a
better idea what time next week

Efrieum
34 warrior
Innorruuk
